content: Learning algorithms can be helpful for understanding the potential of computer science because they provide a way to solve problems using computational thinking. Understanding a specific algorithm and its characteristics can give you a deeper understanding of how to approach and solve a problem, which can be useful regardless of the programming language used to implement it. Additionally, understanding the underlying principles of algorithms can help you understand the trade-offs and limitations of different approaches, which can be useful in choosing the right tool for a specific task. However, learning a programming language is also important, as it allows you to actually implement and test your ideas.
